name: Crazy High Way
description:
Game Made for Midterms

it is a combination of a car racing dodging game with puzzles.

the cars that the player "drives" to are instantiated in a predetermined way giving the game a re playability, and memorizing the pattern is the way to get better.

use the left and right direction keys to move

and the up and down keys to move up and down.

visit SilverCrownGames.com for upcoming projects.
